QuestData.Title: The Shrine of Two Moons
QuestData.Description: Look at this creature, traveler. Only moments after we arrived, this mogu assassin attacked with no warning.$B$BHis blade was intended for the leader of the Golden Lotus. It is very lucky indeed that we were here to stop the attack.$B$BSeeing this attempt on Zhi's life, I fear for the safety of those who have already entered the valley.$B$BThe caretakers are settling your people into the city to the northeast. Go and speak to the leaders. Make sure they are safe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Jaluu the Generous, Mokimo the Strong, Elder Liao, and Madam Vee Luo in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
